item.description:
Smile has asked me about Boston's love of sports and old fashioned pubs. Both of these things go back a long way in Boston's history and are pretty famous.

If you are free Friday evening and will help me get Smile away from all her hard work and books, maybe we can find a place that celebrates both of these Boston traditions.


WHEN: 8:30 P.M.

WHERE: We can meet outside of the Park Street Station (MBTA, Red and Green Line stop).

From Park Street, we can walk a few blocks to Faneuil Hall area where I know of a few places.
item.how_to_find_us: I shall bring a Meetup Sign - also, RSVP'ing members can receive my contact number.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: FRIDAY SMILES
